accuracy.description: Accuracy measures aim and precision, and measures your ability to hit targets with ranged or thrown weapons.

focuses.name: Bows
focuses.description: Proficiency with string-fired weapons, from a handdrawn compound bow to a mechanical crossbow.

focuses.name: Gunnery
focuses.description: Proficiency with precision heavy ranged weapons, including ship-mounted weapons.

focuses.name: Pistols
focuses.description: Proficiency with single-grip, short-barrel ballistic weapons.

focuses.name: Rifles
focuses.description: Proficiency with double-grip, long-barrel ballistic weapons.

focuses.name: Throwing
focuses.description: Proficiency with thrown weapons, including grenades.

communication.description: Communication covers social skills and generally making friends and influencing people.

focuses.name: Bargaining
focuses.description: Negotiating with others and making deals.

focuses.name: Deception
focuses.description: Tricking and lying to other people.

focuses.name: Disguise
focuses.description: Changing your appearance to look like someone else.

focuses.name: Etiquette
focuses.description: Knowing the social niceties of various cultures.

focuses.name: Expression
focuses.description: Conveying thoughts and ideas effectively through words.

focuses.name: Gambling
focuses.description: Playing games of chance and profiting from them.

focuses.name: Investigation
focuses.description: Interviewing people for information and finding and deciphering clues.

focuses.name: Performing
focuses.description: Entertaining an audience with a type of performance art.

focuses.name: Persuasion
focuses.description: Convincing others to agree with you.

focuses.name: Seduction
focuses.description: Getting attention through romantic and sexual allure.

constitution.description: Constitution is your character’s overall health, fortitude, and resistance to harm, illness, and fatigue.

dexterity.description: Dexterity covers deftness, agility, and reaction time, affecting how quickly and gracefully you move.

fighting.description: Fighting is your character’s capability and prowess in close combat, ranging from a brawl to wielding weapons.

intelligence.description: Intelligence measures a character’s reasoning, memory, problem-solving, and overall knowledge.

perception.description: Perception is the ability to pick up on and notice things using any of the character’s senses.

strength.description: Strength is sheer muscle power and the ability to apply it, from lifting heavy things to feats of athletics.

willpower.description: Willpower measures self-control, self-discipline, mental fortitude, and confidence.
